overview_of_class: Explore our solar system and learn about its origin with the accretion and differentiation of bodies resulting in inner rocky planets and outer gas giants with their myriad of diverse satellites.  Discover the cataclysmic early history of Earth's  moon; find out about space missions and discoveries, the recent discovery of exoplanets, and the ongoing search for extra-terrestrial intelligence.  Consider sites for life in our solar system and beyond.
name: Exploration of the Solar System
title: WCAS EARTH 110-0-01 Exploration of the Solar System

descriptions.name: Overview of class
descriptions.value: Explore our solar system and learn about its origin with the accretion and differentiation of bodies resulting in inner rocky planets and outer gas giants with their myriad of diverse satellites. Discover the cataclysmic early history of Earth's moon; find out about space missions and discoveries, the recent discovery of exoplanets, and the ongoing search for extra-terrestrial intelligence. Consider sites for life in our solar system and beyond.

descriptions.name: Class Materials (Required)
descriptions.value: Cosmic Perspective, The Solar System, 7th Edition, ISBN13: 9780321841063, Publisher's price: $109.80

subject: EARTH
